name: Drumaxx Drum Kit
summary: A DMKIT file is a drum kit used by Drumaxx, a percussion plug-in for Image-Line FL Studio . It contains a set of sixteen drum pads that Drumaxx uses to synthesize drum sounds.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Image-Line FL Studio with Drumaxx plug-in installed

macos.display_name: Image-Line FL Studio with Drumaxx plug-in installed
